definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The filiform needle can also be fitted out for traditional electric acupuncture therapy.
sentences.chinese: 也可配用毫針進行傳統電針灸治療。

sentences.english: There are some shortcomings in electric control for four rope grab of a grab crane.
sentences.chinese: 抓鬥起重機配用四繩抓鬥的電氣控制存在着缺點。

sentences.english: The function of omnidirectional contact detonation is required in contact fuzes used on many ammunitions.
sentences.chinese: 許多彈藥配用的觸發引信要求具有萬向觸發起爆功能。

definition: to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to install/to assemble/to load goods (on ships etc)
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
to share/to use in common/suitable/fit for purpose/useable
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
